first_translate: siegren.

hangle: 설마 우리가 영원히 함께할 거라 생각했던 건 아니지?
first_translate: did you really think we’d stay together forever?
we’re both adults now.

hangle: 아무리 소꿉친구라도 이 시기가 되면 길이 갈라지는 건 당연해.
first_translate: it’s only normal for childhood friends like us to go our separate ways at some point.
hah...
you can be so cold sometimes.
I prefer “rational.”
do you plan on living in the capital from now on?
not sure yet.

hangle: 일단은 좀 따뜻한 곳으로 가고 싶네.
first_translate: for now, I just want to head somewhere warm.
I see...

hangle: 그렇게 서운한 표정은 짓지 말았으면 좋겠는데….
first_translate: can you please stop looking at me like that? it makes me feel bad.
you’re not a child anymore.

hangle: 진심으로 나와 쭉 시간을 보낼 수 있을거라 믿었단 말이야?
first_translate: did you honestly believe we could spend all this time together?

hangle: 하지만 수도에 간다니까 시그렌이 이러는 이유는 짐작이 간다.
first_translate: but since he reacted this way when I told him about going to the capital,

hangle: 그곳은 자신의 목숨을 노렸던 자들의 본거지.
first_translate: that must mean he knows his life is still being threatened by those people there.

hangle: 시그렌에게 수도란 고향이자 도망쳐 나온 장소이니.
first_translate: the capital was where siegren grew up before running away.
don’t be sad, siegren.
if everything goes according to how things happened in the novel,

hangle: 시그렌도 수도로 올 수 있게 될 테지.
first_translate: then you’ll come back here too someday.

hangle: 어디에 있든지 난 항상 너의 편일 테니까.
first_translate: no matter what happens or wherever you are, know that I’m always rooting for you.
and if you ever need help,
I’ll run straight to your side.
what if I ask you to stay here with me?
well, that won’t work out.

hangle: 네가 헤일론에 계속 박혀 있으면 이야기 진행이 안되니까.
first_translate: staying in hairlon will hinder my progress through the story.
apart from that though,
your words contradict each other.
in which part?

hangle: 위기가 닥칠 때 도와줄 수 있는 친구가 있는 게 얼마나 중요한데?
first_translate: isn’t having someone around to save you during times of crisis important?
fiona...
how do you view me as?
well...

hangle: 이 세상에서 가장 소중한 존재로 여기고 있어.
first_translate: as the most precious person in this world.
okay then.

hangle: 내가 어디론가 떠나면 어떻게 할 것 같아?
first_translate: so what would you do if I left?
if siegren...
...left me behind...
of course, I’d wish him well while seeing him off!
and if he needed any help, I’d rush over right away!
that’s what friends are for!
alright,
I guess I shouldn’t have asked you anything.
what?
gosh, but it’s freezing outside.
maybe I should wear something warmer--
the maids said they washed the blankets earlier today...
where did they put them again...?
fiona.
siegren...?
this feels strange.
even though siegren hugged me from behind,

hangle: 꼭 시그렌의 품에 갇힌 것 같다.
first_translate: it felt more like I was trapped within his arms instead.

hangle: 어차피 이곳을 떠날 거면 그냥 수도에 있어.
first_translate: if you’re leaving anyway, why don’t you just live in the capital?
now that I think about it, maybe it isn’t such a big deal after all.
after all, that’s been happening until now.
no matter where you may be,

hangle: 난 반드시 너의 뒤를 쫓아갈 거야.
first_translate: I promise to follow you anywhere.
I remember making a similar promise to her once before...
...in the past.

hangle: 내가 널 만나러 갈 수 있도록 노력할게.
first_translate: I’ll try my best to meet you whenever possible.
he made a vow to me.
therefore,
wait for me in the capital.
siegren...
a few months later
is that all you’ve got?
yes.
I never had much attachment toward material objects.
look at everyone gathered here to bid their farewells.
too bad siegren didn’t show up.

hangle: 제가 떠난다는 사실에 굉장히 서운해 했거든요.
first_translate: he seemed quite upset upon hearing news of my departure.

hangle: 그거 말고 다른 말은 안 했느냐?
first_translate: did he say anything else besides that?
only that he’ll definitely chase after me.

hangle: 원래 주인공이 안 하던 짓을 하면 사망 플래그인데.
first_translate: when main characters act differently than usual, it usually signals death flags.
that sounds very typical of him.
take this.
it’s a letter of introduction.

hangle: 수도에 있는 헤일론 저택에 머물고 싶을 때 사용하거라.
first_translate: use it when you need to stay at house hairlon in the capital.
at the townhouse owned by house hairlon!
my final payment turned out to be pretty generous.
let’s hope it wasn’t actually the last one.
uh...
well then,
your grace.
thank you for taking care of me thus far.
all right.
abel always manages to keep himself composed even in situations like these.

we’ll miss you!
see you soon!
